text: There are three malls linked via under ground passageway, so you can walk comfortably regardless of weather. Signs are obvious and clear indicating the exits to the malls and other places. There are staff in platforms and in control station. lifts and escalators are available. Handicapped friendly.

They should upgrade novena because there is a hospital near novena and so many old people so crowded when unboard the train i take train to go school sometimes and these new aircons that made in 2025 are useless i live here tho but the mall makes it worse for me because it take more space bbut im moving near blk so i hope they upgrade it still.

Underground MRT station on the North-South (Red) line near the Central area, served by three nearby malls. Most amenities can be found in the nearby malls, and the station itself has a Cheers on the same floor as the control station.

As a tourist, i can't find any dustbin here in the platform nor any of the station itself. Dustbin seems like never appear in most of the station. It is so inconvenient for us to "free" our hand, especially when we have some trash / a cup of drink that wasn't allowed to bring along and we have got no place to throw away. This is just a simple facilities yet so hard for Singapore government to provide, will you allow us to throw on the floor ?!!!!ðŸ™„
Next, there is no public facilities like toilet in the transit itself, so if you are travelling for far distance, make sure you empty your bladder before get yourself onboard.
Singapore is a developed nation, with world class public transportation and punctuality on public transportation, however, there is still a medium for improvement.

Very hot station
